TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Hunhungaz, title = Hunhungaz, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hunhungaz} }

S.FORM: Hunhungaz Itiniay i Zhuoxi Cen no Hualien ko Hunhungaz a niyaro', 65 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 229 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 96% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 219 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 4% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 10 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Bunun 84%, Amis 4%, Tayal 1%, roma 6%. Ira ko picodadan i niyaro'. Ira ko kofa i niyaro'.

Honhongaz Itiniay i Zhooxi Cen no Hoalien ko Honhongaz a niyaro', 65 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 229 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 96% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 219 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 4% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 10 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Bonon 84%, Amis 4%, Tayal 1%, roma 6%. Ira ko picodadan i niyaro'. Ira ko kofa i niyaro'.
